attributes.action: Stop the government using taxpayer money to fund the Pro-EU campaign
attributes.background: Today 23 Feb 2016, the Prime Minister stated that ministers who oppose the Government's official position on the EU Referendum would not be able to utilise the civil service. The civil service is funded by the taxpayer, and should not be utilised at all for campaigning for either side.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/122756
